item.title: Custom Site Title Per Drupal Installation (d8)
item.description: Do you have several drupal installation in a test server that you want to distinguish which is which? Add this to settings.local.php and it will override whatever is in database. 1$config['system.site']['name'] = "Example Site (Fixes)";
